message:
SYSTEM: SPARQL_optimization_slides.pdf: Página 16
References
Olaf Görlitz and Steffen Staab. Federated Data Management and Query 
Optimization for Linked Open Data. Book chapter to appear. 2010. 
Harth, A., Hose, K., Karnstedt, M., Polleres, A., Sattler, K., and Umbrich, J. 
2010. Data summaries for on-demand queries over linked data. In  WWW 
'10. 
Neumann, T. and Weikum, G. 2008. RDF-3X: a RISC-style engine for 
RDF. Proc. VLDB Endow. 1, 1 (Aug. 2008) 
J. Pérez, M. Arenas, and C. Gutierrez. Semantics and complexity of 
SPARQL. In ISWC 2006.
Quilitz, B. and Leser, U. Querying distributed RDF data sources with 
SPARQL. In ESWC 2008.
M. Schmidt, M. Meier, and G. Lausen. Foundations of SPARQL query 
optimization. In ICDT2010.
Stocker, M., Seaborne, A., Bernstein, A., Kiefer, C., and Reynolds, D. 
SPARQL basic graph pattern optimization using selectivity estimation. 
In WWW '08.
Stuckenschmidt, H., Vdovjak, R., Houben, G., and Broekstra, J. Index 
structures and algorithms for querying distributed RDF repositories. In 
WWW '04.
speaker: SYSTEM
